video_prompt: A profile face subtly shifts, as ethereal hair strands unfurl. A luminous spiral pulsates, emitting light rays that trace new paths. Glowing points of light twinkle and drift in evolving patterns. Delicate, metallic threads weave and undulate, catching dynamic highlights. Translucent spheres subtly deform and reflect shifting light sources, connected by weaving, glowing filaments.
image_prompt: Dark ethereal profile portrait of a woman with white hair, luminous blue-white spiraling energy burst, glowing magical threads, and reflective spheres in a cosmic, starry atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: A profile face subtly shifts, ethereal hair unfurls. A luminous spiral pulsates, emitting light rays that trace new, evolving paths. Glowing points of light twinkle, drifting in intricate, evolving patterns. Delicate metallic threads weave and undulate, catching dynamic highlights. Translucent spheres subtly deform, reflecting shifting light sources, interconnected by weaving, glowing filaments.
